mdRecord.dcterms:title: Criminal Warrants, Justice of the Peace: Commonwealth vs Reid, John W., Robert and James Conner
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commonwealth vs Reid, John W., Robert and James Conner Offense: Assault and Battery Victim and Complainant: W.G. Hubbard Recorded in Floyd County Courthouse 12.04.1887 Warrant dismissed, Court cost: $6.50
